name: Don't Burn My Nugget (LD50)
description:
Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare Jam 50 with Vincent & Stephanie

Save Nugget

Channel the power of rad and send it down a volcano in a last ditch attempt to slow an eruption and save your buddy, Nuggets the dog from inevitable doom in this 2D skateboarding endless runner. 

 

Skate down a volcano

Drop in, catch some air and land sick flips to gain speed. Collect water crystals to delay the inevitable demise of Nuggets and hope for a miracle.
